html:
1.16.18  1:30 am   How long do your videos take on average

     longer than i wish

1.16.18  1:29 am   Do you ever use proper capitalization?

     it depends on the propriety of the situation

1.15.18  11:40 pm   If you think imagination is infinitive, try to imagine a new color, bitch

     sorry i am busy imagining patterns

1.15.18  10:17 pm   how do i take over the universe

     start by taking over yourself

1.15.18  10:14 pm   1.14.18  2:40 pm what was the story about?

     a guy named steve. actually that might not be his name

1.15.18  9:12 pm   Have you ever fired yourself? 

     every day bro

1.15.18  8:53 pm   why don't you collaborate with other people in your songs and videos?

     i don't know

     getting backup vocals from another person or getting someone else to animate the videos would be interesting, i think. 

     ok, i will do it

1.15.18  8:35 pm   i met a girl, now what

     put her info into your contacts list

1.15.18  6:50 pm   Have you ever seen an octopus? 

     i have seen them online

1.15.18  6:37 pm   what is your favorite part about being bill wurtz

     the illuminati guest membership

1.15.18  6:06 pm   is there any subject/topic that can't be turned into a song?

     no

1.15.18  5:43 pm   This is crazy. We're just out here living, existing lol 

     ah, so true

1.15.18  5:27 pm   Why do bad things happen to good people 

     because you may have been cherrypicking the data

1.15.18  5:20 pm   what is the worst thing to store in a locked closet?

     the key?

1.15.18  5:16 pm   what are your deepest, most powerful feelings at this moment?

     did i leave the iron on? oh wait i don't have an iron, some countries don't even have clothes, the least i could do is wear wrinkly clothes

1.15.18  5:13 pm   Hey so I was just thinking about this- so I'm way more creative and have way more interesting ideas when I'm in places I don't wanna be yet when I'm home and in the place I wanna be it's way harder to generate ideas when I'm happy and comfortable. So I'm way more creative when I'm uncomfortable and irritated and I think it's because my mind is desperate to do something else. Is it the same for you? Idk I find it very interesting. Oh and btw how could I kind of maximize my creative potential when I am comfortable and stuff if that makes sense? Cause it's way harder to generate good ideas in a comfortable setting for me for some reason. 

     i'm not sure, but i tend to get most new ideas when i am on the way from one place to another. i have a way to document them quickly on the go, and i put them into the system. but then the work takes place in the writing studio, which is supposed to be a very quiet boring place

1.15.18  4:33 pm   Hey I'm really depressed and sad about my life but I can't change it. What do I do?

     keep looking for ways to change it

1.15.18  4:19 pm   Do you have ADHD?

     you mean "Ah, Damn, Hot Darn" yes i do have that

1.15.18  3:44 pm   is pottery poetry? 

     almost

1.15.18  2:43 pm   do you think that hard things can be easy if you are smart enough?

     sure, or the other ways around

1.15.18  2:32 pm   can you give me an example

     sure

1.15.18  2:03 pm   do u have any plans to collab w other artists 

     no

1.15.18  1:57 pm   what question is the best?

     i have it written down somewhere

1.15.18  11:27 am   how do i become even more reasonable?

     do all the same reasonable things you normally do, twice as loud

1.15.18  9:50 am   do you find the ampersand (&) to be a useful symbol

     sort of but not that much

1.15.18  9:21 am   How do I stop procrastinating? It's absolutely ruining my life. I stress a lot but I never have the urge to finish my work. Please send help!!

     first, stop using the word 'procrastinate.' it's a terribly long word and it wastes a lot of time

1.15.18  8:32 am   How do?

     by

1.15.18  7:01 am   Where do I start?

     where you are

1.15.18  5:11 am   Do you have a favourite word

     what i like best is to use different words together in an ensemble

1.15.18  3:37 am   How do i stop being sad ?

     how did you start

1.15.18  3:31 am   if you like the word 'fuck what do you think of its predecessor fuck.

     i like it

1.15.18  1:54 am   Do you really answer questions here?

     yes

1.14.18  10:25 pm   hey what does a major seventh invert into?

     minor second

1.14.18  8:52 pm   How's the world doing? 

     good

1.14.18  8:52 pm   do you have any advice for people feeling uninspired to write lyrics

     don't forget to use music

1.14.18  8:48 pm   Hey bill have you ever felt super anxious about sharing your work or your thoughts/ opinions with the rest of the world?

     yes

      Like fear of your work being judged? Cause it sure as hell terrifies me. How do I get over this feeling and just do it? 

     wear a helmet

1.14.18  7:12 pm   How can I tell whether my fears are rational or irrational?

     see if they happen

1.14.18  7:03 pm   Do you think imagination is infinite?

     yes

1.14.18  6:44 pm   do you need help with the website?

     no

     cause this site hurts every developer's eyes

     that's not why i made it, but i would suggest viewing the site from the front, not the back, which i think is a mistake developers often make when viewing sites

     No bad intentions, seriously asking

1.14.18  6:35 pm   Don't you get tired of answering people who ask some form of "when is the new video coming out"?

     great news, i've learned to answer them in my sleep

1.14.18  5:47 pm   What's your status?

     good

1.14.18  5:40 pm   Do you have a questions page? 

     i will check

1.14.18  5:13 pm   How do those xylophone (or vibraphone, marimba, etc) players do that thing where they hold two mallets in each hand? That always blows my mind. Like are they just shifting around their knuckles to either make the mallets go further apart or closer together to play whatever interval they're trying to play?

     yes

      That seems incredibly difficult. 

     i think it would be more difficult to make a xylophone

1.14.18  4:15 pm   Do you upload your content on the website first or on YouTube first, because I have only been checking the expert mode page and not youtube.

     usually at the same time

1.14.18  3:48 pm   would you say that knowing how to read sheet music is crucial to becoming a better musician?

     not really

1.14.18  3:09 pm   how does it feel to be adorn and respected by so many people?

     nice, very good

     is it worth the downsides to popularity??

     yes

1.14.18  3:05 pm   Hey! Do you know what is it about this video thats making it take much longer compared to the last few ones?

     don't worry about it

1.14.18  3:04 pm   Thoughts on the Era of Good Feelings?

     let us not forget that there were bad feelings in the era as well

1.14.18  2:40 pm   when was the last time you came up with an elaborate fictional story

     june 23, 2017

1.14.18  2:33 pm   Do you have feelings? 

     i will check
